section.p: The shack consists of a bamboo hut raised above the ground on stout poles to protect it from flooding. The roof is palm thatch. It is simple but comfortable.

outcomes.outcome: A thief has taken any money left here

Fire has
destroyed the shack and its contents

p.if: You can rest here if injured (restore your Stamina to its normal unwounded score). You can also leave money and possessions here to save having to carry them around with you. Make a note in the box below of anything you are leaving at the shack.

section.p: When you’ve finished at your shack, . Remember to erase the tick next to the shack option there if your home was destroyed by fire.
